Island¶

class biosim.island.Island(island_map)[source]¶

Island class. Superclass for all landscape types.

Methods

Adds carnivores to the island population.

Generates a list of cells near current cell.

Yearly cycle for aging.

Performs operations related to the annual cycle for one cell.

Yearly cycle for procreation.

Constructs the map of the island.

total_population(self)

Constructs a list containing all the animals on the island.

Class constructor for island.

Parameters

island_map (str) – String containing information about the island such as shape and landscape type.

add_carnivores(self, animal, animals)[source]¶

Adds carnivores to the island population. Used for ‘adding_population’ method.

Parameters

  • animal (class object) – Carnivore object to be added to the population.

  • animals (list) – List of animals to be added to the population.

add_herbivores(self, animal, animals)[source]¶

Adds herbivores to the island population. Used for ‘adding_population’ method.

Parameters

  • animal (class object) – Herbivore object to be added to the population.

  • animals (list) – List of animals to be added to the population.

adding_population(self, population)[source]¶

Adds population to the island.

Parameters

population (List) –

List containing dictionaries describing the population’s location and population type.

Required format: ini_animals = [{ “loc”: (coordinate_x, coordinate_y), “pop”: [

{“species”: str(animal_species), “age”: age, “weight”: weight} for _ in range(number_of_animals) ],

}]

generate_nearby_cells(self)[source]¶

Generates a list of cells near current cell. These cells are used for animal migration.

island_aging(self)[source]¶

Yearly cycle for aging. All animals on the island turn one year older.

island_cycle(self)[source]¶

Performs operations related to the annual cycle for one cell.

island_deaths(self)[source]¶

Yearly cycle for death. Checks for all animals on the island if the die.

island_feeding(self)[source]¶

Yearly cycle for feeding. All animals on the island attempts to feed.

island_fodder_growth(self)[source]¶

Yearly cycle for fodder growth. Fodder grows for all cells on the island.

island_loss_of_weight(self)[source]¶

Yearly cycle for loss of weight. All animals on the island loses weight.

island_migration(self)[source]¶

Yearly cycle for migration. All animals on the island cell attempts to migrate. Resets the ‘has_moved’ status of the animals afterwards.

island_procreate(self)[source]¶

Yearly cycle for procreation. All animals on the island attempts to procreate.

map_constructor(self)[source]¶

Constructs the map of the island.

total_population(self)[source]¶

Constructs a list containing all the animals on the island.

Returns

total_population_list – List containing the total population on the island.

Return type

list
